CustomField.description: Used to build Opportunity Snopshot SE Must be updated evey time the Offer__c field is modified
CustomField.formula:
SUBSTITUTE( IF (INCLUDES(Offer__c,'.Net' ),'.Net; ',null ) & IF (INCLUDES(Offer__c,'Advanced Analytics' ),'Advanced Analytics; ',null ) & IF (INCLUDES(Offer__c,'Architecture Advisory' ),'Architecture Advisory; ',null ) & IF (INCLUDES(Offer__c,'Business Analysis' ),'Business Analysis; ',null ) & IF (INCLUDES(Offer__c,'Business Central' ),'Business Central; ',null ) & IF (INCLUDES(Offer__c,'Business Design' ),'Business Design; ',null ) & IF (INCLUDES(Offer__c,'Business Transformation' ),'Business Transformation; ',null ) & IF (INCLUDES(Offer__c,'Cloud' ),'Cloud; ',null ) & IF (INCLUDES(Offer__c,'Cyber Security & Connectivity' ),'Cyber Security & Connectivity; ',null ) & IF (INCLUDES(Offer__c,'Data Engineering' ),'Data Engineering; ',null ) & IF (INCLUDES(Offer__c,'Data Strategy' ),'Data Strategy; ',null ) & IF (INCLUDES(Offer__c,'Delivery Management' ),'Delivery Management; ',null ) & IF (INCLUDES(Offer__c,'DevOps' ),'DevOps; ',null ) & IF (INCLUDES(Offer__c,'Digital Design' ),'Digital Design; ',null ) & IF (INCLUDES(Offer__c,'Experience Tech' ),'Experience Tech; ',null ) & IF (INCLUDES(Offer__c,'Finance' ),'Finance; ',null ) & IF (INCLUDES(Offer__c,'Information, Risk & Governance' ),'Information, Risk & Governance; ',null ) & IF (INCLUDES(Offer__c,'Integration' ),'Integration; ',null ) & IF (INCLUDES(Offer__c,'Java' ),'Java; ',null ) & IF (INCLUDES(Offer__c,'Modern Workplace' ),'Modern Workplace; ',null ) & IF (INCLUDES(Offer__c,'Other' ),'Other; ',null ) & IF (INCLUDES(Offer__c,'Project Management' ),'Project Management; ',null ) & IF (INCLUDES(Offer__c,'Salesforce' ),'Salesforce; ',null ) & IF (INCLUDES(Offer__c,'Service Design' ),'Service Design; ',null ) & IF (INCLUDES(Offer__c,'Servicedesk' ),'Servicedesk; ',null ) & IF (INCLUDES(Offer__c,'Solutions' ),'Solutions; ',null ) & IF (INCLUDES(Offer__c,'Strategy & Insight' ),'Strategy & Insight; ',null ) & IF (INCLUDES(Offer__c,'Sustainability' ),'Sustainability; ',null ) & IF (INCLUDES(Offer__c,'Tech Transformation Advisory' ),'Tech Transformation Advisory; ',null ) & IF (INCLUDES(Offer__c,'MS CRM' ),'MS CRM; ',null ) & IF (INCLUDES(Offer__c,'Analytics' ),'Analytics; ',null ) & IF (INCLUDES(Offer__c,'Quality Engineering' ),'Quality Engineering; ',null ) &
"-", "; -", null )
CustomField.label: Offer Snapshot
